bibl.title: Telegram from [s.n.] Bash to the [Commanding General?] at Bordeaux, December 23, 1918

div1.p: Moran is ordered to report to Mars-sur-Allier, France for duty as a hospital disbursing officer.

div1.head: Telegram from [s.n.] Bash to the [Commanding General?] at Bordeaux, December 23, 1918
div1.opener:
SIGNAL CORPS, UNITED STATES ARMY.
23 DEC 1918
TELEGRAM
RECEIVED AT: BORDEAUX
B65RCMCS 54 OB COUNT DASH
TOURS DEC 23 1918
C G BORDEAUX
div1.p:
Q-479 ORDERS ISSUED TODAY RELIEVE CAPT J J MORAN QM C FURTHER DUTY YOUR
STATION AND DIRECT HIM PROCEED TO MARS SUR ALLIER (NIEVRE) REPORTING TO
C O FOR DUTY AS DISBURSING OFFICER HOSPITAL CENTER RELIEVING 2ND LT P O
GRAMMER QM C PERIOD PLEASE EXPEDITE HIS DEPARTURE
div1.closer:
BASH 81OP
Copy to Base QM for issuance of necessary orders.
BASE SECTION No 2
* OFFICIAL *
Q. M.
(COPY)
